ygData.subject: Thanks to all of you
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been a member of this group sense I started playing EQ (only about a year ago) and thanks to all your help I have got a class and race of car. I now
ygData.messageBody:
I have been a member of this group sense I started playing EQ (only
about a year ago) and thanks to all your help I have got a class and
race of car. I now love to play and have got him up to 22nd level
last night and was asked to join (and did join) a Guild. I only play
for about an hour or so a day and it is my way to get away from the
world for a few and reconnect with myself each day. Thanks to all the
help and advice I have got here EQ has been made even more fun. I
just wanded to help all the people here who have helped out when
someone crys out " help! my 5th level Shaman / beastLord / Warror /
Mage ect is stuck in ...."

Wareslice
Beastlord of the
22nd circle
ie:

Wolff
